components.hint:
LPA reference numbers are 12 numbers long

For example, 7000-0000-0000
components.label: LPA reference number
components.name: auto_name__2

components.html:
* The reference number is printed on the letter that told you the LPA had been registered.
* You can also find the reference number on the LPA or any related letters from the Office of the Public Guardian.
* It may be marked 'OPG reference number' or 'Our ref' or 'Case number'.
components.summary: Where to find the LPA reference number

components.html: The donor and each of the attorneys will have their own activation key. The activation key and date of birth must be for the same person.

components.hint:
Activation keys are 13 numbers and letters long and start with a C

For example, C-AB12 CD34 EF56
components.label: Activation key
components.name: auto_name__3

components.html:
Your activation key is printed on the letter that told you the LPA had been registered. The donor and each attorney will have their own unique activation key.

If you cannot find it, please request a new activation key.
components.summary: Where to find the activation key

components.legend: What is your date of birth?
components.name: auto_name__5

heading: Add a lasting power of attorney
lede: You'll need the details from the letter we sent you when the lasting power of attorney (LPA) was registered
